channel.title: Hardware-backed Full Disk Encryption (FDE)
channel.description: Encryption keys are stored in hardware (like a TPM or otherwise), meaning even if the disk is removed, it cannot be decrypted without the original device.

item.title: Hardware-backed Full Disk Encryption (FDE)
item.dc:creator: nurmagoz
item.description:
Encryption keys are stored in hardware (like a TPM or otherwise), meaning even if the disk is removed, it cannot be decrypted without the original device.

Read full topic
